channel.title: Al Jazeera – Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera
channel.description: Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera

image.title: Al Jazeera – Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera
image.description: Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera

item.title: Energy summit seeks to curb cooking habits that kill millions every year
item.description: Harmful cooking practices result in the deaths of 3.7 million people every year with children and women most at risk.

item.title: Use of fire as weapon in Sudan war surged last month, study finds
item.description: Investigators from Sudan Witness are using open source technology to document the systematic use of fire by combatants.

item.title: Thousands evacuate as wildfire grows ‘dramatically’ in western Canada
item.description: Authorities say wind will push the Parker Lake Wildfire closer to the small community of Fort Nelson, British Columbia.

item.title: Michael Cohen heads to court to testify against ex-boss Donald Trump
item.description: Former Trump attorney Michael Cohen is set to testify against his ex-boss over hush money payments to Stormy Daniels.

item.title: Extermination, expulsion ‘identifiable strategies’ of Israel’s war in Gaza
item.description: A human rights group calls on the United Kingdom to stop arming Israel as its campaign in the strip continues.

item.title: Palestinian girl rescued from rubble after Israeli attack in Gaza
item.description: Video shows the rescue of Palestinian girl who’d been trapped under rubble after an Israeli attack in Gaza.

item.title: African countries call for sanctions as UN nears treaty on ‘biopiracy’
item.description: The UN has been working for decades on a treaty to prevent the exploitation of genetic resources.

item.title: Why Egypt joining ICJ case against Israel is ‘unprecedented’
item.description: Egypt says it will join South Africa’s genocide case against Israel at the ICJ.

item.title: India election more than halfway through, Kashmir valley votes in Phase 4
item.description: Kashmir voters are expected to show their discontent with Modi's cancellation of the region's special status in 2019.

item.title: Guardiola backs England for Euro 2024 glory
item.description: The Manchester City manager believes England are 'really close' to winning their first Euro title.

item.title: Xi’s European tour exposed the EU’s persisting divisions
item.description: Hungary opposes a tougher EU stance on China, but it is not the only one.

item.title: Australian court lifts social media ban on Sydney church stabbing video
item.description: X was alone in insisting on debate on 'free speech' following removal of film from social media.

item.title: Germany hopes to relive World Cup ‘fairytale’ with Euro 2024
item.description: Football experts believe Euro 2024 can bring positives to the nation similar to Germany's staging of the 2006 World Cup.

item.title: West Bank: Family Under Fire
item.description: A Palestinian family of activists in the occupied West Bank resist settler expansion as violence intensifies.

item.title: ‘The goal is not peace’: What’s behind Putin’s wartime Russia reshuffle?
item.description: President's surprise reshuffle to see deputy prime minister and economist Andrei Belousov seize defence minister's role.

item.title: Will Israel’s war on Gaza sway South Africa’s election?
item.description: Ruling ANC is vocally pro-Palestine while main opposition DA is neutral on Gaza war, which may affect voters on May 29.

item.title: Court confirms German intelligence surveillance of ‘extremist’ AfD
item.description: Court finds 'sufficient evidence' to justify the classification of the far-right party as a threat to democracy.

item.title: Host nation Germany set for massive security challenge at Euro 2024
item.description: Germany faces multiple security threats at Euro 2024 with hooliganism and Ukraine two of the main concerns.

item.title: Tunisian lawyer arrested by masked police during live news report
item.description: See the moment a prominent lawyer and critic of the Tunisian government was arrested by masked police officers.

item.title: Star witness Cohen testifies against Trump in hush money trial
item.description: Former Trump lawyer's testimony set to be key in ex-president's criminal prosecution, six months ahead of US election.

item.title: UK charges three with working for Hong Kong intelligence
item.description: Suspects accused of violating National Security Act as cases against Chinese and Russian spies mount across Europe.

item.title: Gaza solidarity encampments: We, as educators, need to protect our students
item.description: We have a duty of care for our students who are being attacked for standing against genocide.

item.title: Israelis killing Palestinians ‘in cold blood’ in occupied West Bank
item.description: The number of Palestinians killed there by Israeli soldiers and settlers has reached unprecedented levels.

item.title: Flash floods in Afghanistan devastate lives and livelihoods
item.description: Driven by unusually heavy seasonal rains, the floods have killed hundreds and destroyed homes and livestock.

item.title: Can Pakistan’s Imran Khan and army patch up, a year after violent clashes?
item.description: Both sides have so far rejected concessions, but many analysts say this rupture is untenable and a compromise is needed.
